EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Information (1330724232.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Mark, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index">going here<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig>.
- In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by <http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html">going here<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html">going here<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig>. If you have questions, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK">online schedule. I look forward to speaking with you soon! Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Marc Richards [mailto:mdr@thumblines.com] Sent: Friday, March 02, 2012 12:15 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Earlier appointment time? I'm watching my kids today and they wont be down for a nap until at least 1:00. You can try giving me a call a bit early, say 1:15 or so if that works.
-Marc
-----Original message-----From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> To: "mdr@thumblines.com <mailto:mdr@thumblines.com">mdr@thumblines.com" <<a href="mailto:mdr@thumblines.com>> Sent: Fri, Mar 2, 2012 17:07:07 GMT+00:00 Subject: Earlier appointment time?Hi Marc, I hope your day is going well so far. I was wondering if you may be available to speak at 12:30 today instead of 1:30? I have another meeting that I may have to be a part of that is supposed to start at 1:45 so I didnt want to rush through our call. If you are not available at 12:30 that is fine and we can keep our call time at 1:30. Please advise. Thank you!Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: postmaster@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify <span style='color:#999999> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
